game.name: Kick and Hide
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: One player is a hunter robot that captures rogue robots, while the others try to evade capture in this fast-paced multiplayer game for 4-6 people!
game.shortDescriptionEn: One player is a hunter robot that captures rogue robots, while the others try to evade capture in this fast-paced multiplayer game for 4-6 people!
